00028 #include <util/util.h>
00029 #include <util/util_queue.h>
00030 
00031 #include "llp_queue.h"
00032 #include "llp.h"
00033 
00034 /*============================================================================*/
00035 /* Private data definitions.                                                  */
00036 /*============================================================================*/
00037 
00038 /*
00039  * Size of the queue used to store received datagrams.
00040  */
00041 #define LLP_QUEUE_SIZE  64
00042 
00043 /*
00044  * Queue used to store received datagrams
00045  */
00046 static util_queue_t queue;
00047 
00048 /*============================================================================*/
00049 /* Public functions implementations.                                          */
00050 /*============================================================================*/
00051 
00052 int llp_queue_initialize() {
00053         int return_value;
00054         
00055         return_value = util_initialize_queue(&queue, LLP_QUEUE_SIZE);
00056         return (return_value == UTIL_OK ? LLP_OK : LLP_ERROR);
00057 }
00058 /******************************************************************************/
00059 void llp_queue_finalize() {
00060         util_finalize_queue(&queue);
00061 }
00062 /******************************************************************************/ 
00063 int llp_enqueue_datagram(int session, u_char *datagram, int length) {
00064         int return_value;
00065         
00066         /* We are using the tag pointer to store the session number. */
00067         return_value = util_enqueue(&queue, (void *)session, datagram, length);
00068         return (return_value == UTIL_OK ? LLP_OK : LLP_ERROR);
00069 }
00070 /******************************************************************************/
00071 int llp_dequeue_datagram(int *session, u_char *datagram, int max) {
00072         int return_value;
00073         
00074         /* We are using the tag pointer to store the session number. */
00075         return_value = util_dequeue(&queue, (void **)session, datagram, max);
00076         return (return_value == UTIL_ERROR ? LLP_ERROR : return_value);
00077 }
00078 /******************************************************************************/
00079 int llp_try_dequeue_datagram(int *session, u_char *datagram, int max) {
00080         int return_value;
00081         
00082         /* We are using the tag pointer to store the session number. */
00083         return_value = util_try_dequeue(&queue, (void **)session, datagram, max);
00084         return (return_value == UTIL_ERROR ? LLP_ERROR : return_value);
00085 }
00086 /******************************************************************************/
